column4: Where to find the Hardy file which is equivalent to the Gutsy file /home/detlef/language-pack-gnome-de-base-7.10+20080205/data/de/LC_MESSAGES/gnome-power-manager.po?
detlef@Amilo7600:~/gnome$ LANG=C dpkg -S gnome-power-manager.po; dpkg: *gnome-power-manager.po* not found.
it's just means you didn't install that file with no one package
